Introduction Brief overview of the use case I recently set out to ingest web traffic data into my SIEM solution, which requires data to be ingested in a specific format. After researching various options, I sought an easy-to-use solution that could integrate with our existing Elasticsearch setup. One tool that caught my attention was HoneyPot HTTPD.
